thread.title: News Corp Sells Its Amplify Education Businesses

author: Lukas I. Alpert
title: News Corp Sells Its Amplify Education Businesses
text:
News Corp said Wednesday that it had sold its money-losing Amplify education businesses to members of its management team supported by a group of private investors. The dealâ€™s financial terms weren't disclosed.
News Corp owns The Wall Street Journal and Dow Jones Newswires, among other properties.
